topic.title: Creating and Using External Web Tables

body.p: CREATE EXTERNAL WEB TABLE creates a web table definition. External web tables allow Greenplum Database to treat dynamic data sources like regular database tables. Because web table data can change as a query runs, the data is not rescannable.
You can define command-based or URL-based external web tables. The definition forms are distinct: you cannot mix command-based and URL-based definitions.
